parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (int64) Unique ID for a service principal in the Databricks account.

200.description: Service principal information was updated successfully.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

schemas.description: The schema of the patch request. Must be ["urn:ietf:params:scim:api:messages:2.0:PatchOp"].

requestBody.description: Operations to be applied on service principal information.

patch.description: Partially updates the details of a single service principal in the Databricks account.
